name: Goat-Man
languages: understands Common, Giant, and Trollkin but canâ€™t speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goat-man makes one Bite attack and two Slam attacks. If both Slam attacks hit the same target, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the goat-man moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
